resources.string: Health Connect is supported on this device, but is not currently installed.
To use Vevaio, and other apps using Health Connect, please install the Health Connect package from Google Play.
Health Connect is installed on this device. Please request permissions to explore the app.
Health Connect is only supported on Android devices running API level %1$d or above.
Please visit the Health Connect guides to learn more about device compatibility and using Health Connect.
Hi! Let\'s track daily cumulative steps. Use the menu to explore additional actions.
Location data is used as part of the Google Fit API
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
